description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

Imagine being a top Udemy instructor (like Phil Ebiner) earning a six-figure passive income by teaching on Udemy?

What's it like to be Roma Waterman, a rising star Udemy instructor who has turned her love of singing into an amazing Udemy lifestyle business, earning thousands a month on Udemy?

What's it like to make $40,000 in your first month, with your very first Udemy course like Nick Walter did?

Have you heard of Teresa Greenway, Udemy's star instructor who has made $33,000 in her first 9 months teaching how to bake sourdough bread on Udemy?

You'll learn that and a lot more when you "listen in" to these conversations with 6 of the top Udemy instructors!

In this course, you'll listen in to interviews I conducted with Phil Ebiner, Roma Waterman, and Nick Walter and Teresa Greenway, Dennis J.Smith and Jack Wilson, six of Udemy's top instructors.

You'll learn:

  • Udemy course creation strategies
  • Udemy course marketing techniques
  • Udemy course lighting and video methods
  • Udemy course promotional message tactics
  • How to use your voice correctly while teaching on Udemy
  • How to care for your voice
  • All about choosing the correct Udemy course topics.

And a lot more!

Discover the insider secrets of these top Udemy stars and you'll also enjoy frequent updates of this course with new, exciting interviews to come!

This is your opportunity to eavesdrop on two of Udemy's top rising stars!

Enroll today - your enrollment is guaranteed by Udemy's 30-day, money-back guarantee!
title: Udemy Elite - 6 Top Instructors Share Udemy Tips -Unofficial
